blogPost.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together 👌
blogPost.body: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together 👌
blogPost.title: Findnlink - Find people to work with on your ideas.
blogPost.author: Emil Hopf

localize.description: Findnlink是一个平台，您可以在其中共享您的项目并查找联合创始人/成员。-自定义您的项目页面-创建您自己的公文包/配置文件-展示您的技能我们希望使FindnLink成为将团队联系在一起的强大虚拟工作区👌
localize.tagline: 在你的想法上找到可以合作的人。

localize.description: Findnlink是一個平臺，您可以在其中共享您的項目並查找聯合創始人/成員。-自定義您的項目頁面-創建您自己的公文包/配置文件-展示您的技能我們希望使FindnLink成爲將團隊聯繫在一起的強大虛擬工作區👌
localize.tagline: 在你的想法上找到可以合作的人。

localize.description: Increment.me是一个获取匿名反馈的简单方法。
localize.tagline: 轻松获得任何事情的匿名反馈。

next.excerpt: Bitwit has the vision of making Bitcoin a commonly accepted currency. We enable Bitcoin holders to see where they can spent their money. Bitwit also helps people understand what their daily purchases cost in Bitcoin using the Bitcoin Daily feature.
next.title: Bitwit - Find companies that accept bitcoin as payment

localize.description: Bitwit的愿景是让比特币成为一种普遍接受的货币。我们让比特币的持有者能够看到他们的钱可以花在哪里。Bitwit还通过Bitcoin Daily功能帮助人们了解他们每天购买比特币的成本。
localize.tagline: 寻找接受比特币支付的公司

localize.description: Bitwit的願景是讓比特幣成爲一種普遍接受的貨幣。我們讓比特幣的持有者能夠看到他們的錢可以花在哪裏。Bitwit還通過Bitcoin Daily功能幫助人們瞭解他們每天購買比特幣的成本。
localize.tagline: 尋找接受比特幣支付的公司
